Message Board.publish poll confirmation header: Are you sure you want to publish the poll?
Message Board.publish poll confirmation text: The poll will be appended to the beginning of the queue
Message Board.cancel new poll confirmation text: Are you sure you don’t want to publish this poll?
Message Board.cancel edit poll confirmation text: Are you sure you don’t want to save the changes?
Message Board.save poll confirmation header: Are you sure you want to save the changes to the poll?
Message Board.save draft poll confirmation text: Are you sure you want to save the changes? The poll will remain a draft
Message Board.save published poll confirmation text: Are you sure you want to save the changes? The changes will be visible to the attendees
Message Board.save unpublished poll confirmation text: Are you sure you want to save the changes? They will not be visible to the attendees until the poll is published
Message Board.error creating poll: An error has occurred creating your poll. Please refresh the page and try again
Message Board.error editing poll: Failed to edit poll. Please refresh the page and try again
Message Board.Failed to order polls: Something went wrong with ordering your polls, please refresh the page and try again

Message Board.Failed to end poll: Failed to end poll. Please refresh the page and try again
Message Board.Failed to submit your vote: There was an error submitting your vote, please refresh and try again
Message Board.Empty list: Publish a Poll or Q&A message to all attendees in this group

Poll list item.Publish poll confirmation content: Are you sure you want to publish this poll? It will be visible to all attendees.
Poll list item.Publish ended poll confirmation content: Are you sure you want to publish this poll? The results will be visible to all attendees and voting will be disabled
Poll list item.Unpublish active poll confirmation conte: Are you sure you want to unpublish this poll? It will end, be removed from the Message Board and attendees won’t be able to vote or view results. Ended polls can’t be turned to back to active
Poll list item.Unpublish ended poll confirmation conten: Are you sure you want to unpublish this poll? It will be removed from the Message Board and attendees won’t be able to vote or view results
Poll list item.End poll confirmation content: Are you sure you want to end this poll? Attendees will no longer be able to vote
